page.title: 20RELIGIOUS BELIEFS IN HESSLE
page.content: A survey was held in Hessle Church of England Primary School amongst the school children to find out how many had religious beliefs. The school has about 400 pupils at present and the survey covered nearly all those pupils.The results were as follows: {62%} were Church of England {16% }were "Don't Knows" {10%} were Methodists {5%} were Roman Catholics {1%} were Jehovah's Witnesses {1%} were Jewish {5%} were "Others". The high percentage of "Don't Knows" was made up of children who had not attended a church in their life to their knowledge.
